name: Playwright Docker CI (mcr image)
description: Run Playwright tests in official Docker image on CI.

files.template:
FROM mcr.microsoft.com/playwright:v1.46.0-jammy
WORKDIR /app
COPY package.json package-lock.json* pnpm-lock.yaml* yarn.lock* ./
RUN npm ci || true && pnpm i --frozen-lockfile || true && yarn --frozen-lockfile || true
COPY . .
CMD ["npx", "playwright", "test"]
